name: UNABLE_TO_DELETE_MANAGED
content: Unable to delete managed ${iamType}.

name: UNABLE_TO_DELETE_SYSTEM
content: Unable to delete system ${iamType}.

name: UNABLE_TO_DELETE_LINKED
content: Unable to delete ${iamType}. It is used in ${linkedType}

name: UNABLE_TO_UPDATE_SYSTEM
content: Unable to update system ${iamType}.

name: UNABLE_TO_UPDATE_LINKED
content: Unable to update ${iamType}. It is used in ${linkedType}

name: USER_APPLICATION_CREATE_USER
content: User ${email} applied for an account. Create the user

name: USER_APPLICATION_CREATE_ACCOUNT
content: Create account from ${email}.

name: ACCOUNT_CREATED
content:
Your account for ${email} in Europay is created. You can login at Europay
Greeting, the Europay team.

name: EMAIL_OTP
content:
Your OTP code is ${OTPcode}.This code is valid for: ${OTPvalid}

Greeting, the Europay team.

name: ACCOUNT_BLOCKED
content: your account ${email} for accessing Europay is blocked. Please contact admin

name: OTP_EXPIRED
content: The OTP code ${otp} is expired. Resend?

name: OTP_INCORRECT
content: The OTP code ${otp} is incorrect. Retry?

name: OTP_ALREADY_USED
content: The OTP code ${otp} was already used. Retry?

name: STARTUP
content: EUROPAY STARTED

name: INITIALISATION
content: ${subject} initialised

name: WRONG_LOGIN
content: your login is incorrect. This was attempt ${attemp} of ${maxAttemps}. Retry?

name: TRANSACTION_UNKNOWN_PARTY
content:
Hello ${sender}


you tried to use Europay.
However, ${party} is unknown in Europay.


The Europay team.

name: TRANSACTION_AMOUNT_INSUFFICIENT
content:
Hello ${sender}


you tried to send you a payment to ${receiver}.
However, the amount on your account is UNSUFFICIENT for this payment.

So, the payment is rejected


The Europay team.

name: TRANSACTION_PARTY_WITHOUT_ACCOUNT
content:
Hello ${sender}


you tried to use Europay.
However, ${party} has no account linked into Europay.


The Europay team.

name: EMAIL_WITH_TRANSACTION_MESSAGE
content: email-with-message.html
parameters: {receiverfirstname, receiverlastname, senderfirstname, senderlastname, senderamount, sendercurrencysymbol, sendercurrencycode, sendermessage, transactionid, transactiondate, transactiondirection}

name: EMAIL_WITH_TRANSACTION_NO_MESSAGE
content: email-no-message.html
parameters: {receiverfirstname, receiverlastname, senderfirstname, senderlastname, senderamount, sendercurrencysymbol, sendercurrencycode, transactionid, transactiondate, transactiondirection}

name: EMAIL_PAYMENT_TO_BANK
content:
Hello ${sender}


you successfully transfered ${sendercurrency} ${amount} to the BANK ${bank}.

The Europay team.

name: IBAN_INVALID
content: the IBAN ${iban} is invalid

name: DESTINARY_INVALID
content: Select a valid client or bank

name: AMOUNT_INVALID
content: Enter a valid amount (1 digit or more)

name: PAYMENT_MESSAGE
content: ${message}
